attributes.action: Give british soldiers equipment they need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British soldiers   have had dozens of urgent requests for operational equipment turned down on cost grounds,
foe example helicopter shortage ,kit and other important equipment 
it British servicemen and women have  a "right" to be adequately armed, supplied and reinforced.
And also have the best medical care , accommodation which they are not receiving

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give british soldiers equipment they need."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11273.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/soldierequipment/
